    #include<iostream>
    #include<cstdio>
    #include<list>
    #include<cstring>
    #include<vector>
    #define r(x) scanf("%d",&x)
    using namespace std;
    list<int>*adj;
    int visited[100005];
    int st;
    int iscycle(int v, int visited[], int parent)
    {
    visited[v] = 1;
    list<int>::iterator i;
    for (i = adj[v].begin(); i != adj[v].end(); ++i)
    {
    if (!visited[*i])
    {
    if (iscycle(*i, visited, v))
    return 1;
    }
    else if (*i != parent)
    return 1;
    }
    return 0;
    }
    int main()
    {
    int m,n,x,y,ans=1;
    r(m),r(n);
    adj=new list<int>[m+10];
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
    r(x),r(y);
    adj[x].push_back(y);
    }
    memset(visited,0,sizeof visited);
    if(iscycle(1,visited,-1))
    ans=0;
    for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
    {
    if(visited[i]==0)
    ans=0;
    //cout<<visited[i]<<" "<<endl;
    }
    if(ans)
    printf("YES\n");
    else
    printf("NO\n");
    }
